nf:register.nf:name: cycle_out
nf:register.nf:description: Input register contains cycle parameter for time of sampling (6 possible values [0-5]. 0 is default)

nf:register.nf:name: q0_bitrate_out
nf:register.nf:description: Output register contains output bit rate for queue 0

nf:register.nf:name: q1_bitrate_out
nf:register.nf:description: Output register contains output bit rate for queue 1

nf:register.nf:name: q2_bitrate_out
nf:register.nf:description: Output register contains output bit rate for queue 2

nf:register.nf:name: q3_bitrate_out
nf:register.nf:description: Output register contains output bit rate for queue 3

nf:register.nf:name: total_bitrate_out
nf:register.nf:description: Output register contains output total bitrate
